overview.en: Future farm chain is first based on block chain technology platform for the farm ecosystem, Apple (Apple) is the identification of ecological farm, will serve as a cartoon game interface presented in front of you hold the Apple family, open after Apple, you can use private chat function, the group of OTC (OTC) trading function, trust seal fission function, need competition, and create the master node, etc.
overview.zh: 未来农场链是首个基于区块链技术搭建的农场生态平台，Apple（苹果）是未来农场生态中的身份标识，将作为动漫游戏界面呈现在各位持有apple的家人面前，开启apple后，可使用隐秘聊天功能、群OTC（场外）交易功能、信任钢印裂变功能、TOP10竞赛以及创建主节点等。
